properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 7:45AM MST by NWS Goodland KS
properties.description:
As of 8:30 am CST, patchy dense fog has recently developed in
Graham county, near Hill City. Visibilities should rapidly
improve between 9 AM and 10 AM CST as the fog lifts and
dissipates.

Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution,
particularly at intersections and highway onramps and offramps
where accidents are more likely to occur, and on elevated roadways
such as bridges and overpasses where ice is more likely to
accrue. Use low beam headlights and be prepared for rapid
reductions in visibility, especially near rivers, creeks and other
low lying areas.

NWSheadline: PATCHY DENSE FOG IN GRAHAM AND NORTON COUNTIES THROUGH 10 AM CST
